forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny, with a high near 24. Southwest wind around 6 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.shortForecast: Mostly Cloudy then Chance Light Snow
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of snow after 1am. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 20. South wind around 8 mph. Chance of precipitation is 40%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

weather_report:
As the morning sun casts a warm embrace over Boston, the city awakens to a bright sky, painted in gentle shades of blue with wispy clouds dancing across the horizon. Today greets us with unadulterated clarity, perfect for wandering the streets or sipping coffee on a terrace. Temperatures are poised to reach a comfortable 24 degrees, with a soft southwest breeze adding a pleasant chill that can be felt on exposed skin. The promise of the day ahead beckons to those who cherish the great outdoors; perhaps a leisurely stroll along the Charles River, where the echoes of laughter and the crunch of snow underfoot create a cozy winter symphony.

As night descends, the scene shifts—a hint of snow beginning to whisper from the clouds, accompanied by an escalating wind. Predicted temperatures will gently dip to around 20 degrees, inviting you to wrap up warmly in your finest winter attire. A thick scarf and a sturdy coat will serve you well, ensuring warmth against the chill. As the prospect of nighttime snow lingers, consider a quiet evening at home with a cup of tea, reflecting on the day's tranquility, or perhaps take the chance to embrace the serene beauty of freshly fallen snow, if it arrives. With the right mindset and attire, this day can transform into a cherished winter memory.
